simulator

Interface ProcessControlBlock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessControlBlockImpl

    public interface ProcessControlBlock
    Abstract Description of Process Control Block used by kernel and simulator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ProcessControlBlock.State
      Possible process states.

      java.lang.String toString()
      Obtain a String representation of the PCB of the form '{pid(<pid>), state(<state>), name(<program name>)}'.
